metadata.ns:textReviewContext: Compliance manager works with cloud application
metadata.ns:textReviewProblem: Incorrect or unclear information security section of SLA
metadata.ns:textReference: OI-4: Issues emerging because of poor SLA specification [SECCRIT]; V.31: Lack of completeness and transparency in terms of use [ENISA]; V.23: SLA clauses with conflicting promises to different stakeholders [ENISA]; V.24: SLA clauses containing excessive business risk [ENISA]
